commander.name: Commander
commander.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 3-space radius by 10

commander2.name: Commander II
commander2.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 5-space radius by 15

commander3.name: Commander III
commander3.description: Improves the accuracy of allies in a 7-space radius by 20

commanderex.name: Commander (EX)
commanderex.description: Grants a bond bonus of +70 accuracy

imperator.name: Imperator
imperator.description: Improves the accuracy of all allies by 20

brotherlybonds.name: Brotherly Bonds
brotherlybonds.description: Grants a bond bonus of +35 accuracy

fetid.name: Fetid
fetid.description: Lowers the accuracy of allies in a 3-space radius by 20

imbecile.name: Imbecile
imbecile.description: Inflicts -10 accuracy, evasion, -1 attack power, defense, resistance to allies in a 5-space radius

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description: Improves the evasion of allies in a 5-space radius by 10

synergy.name: Synergy
synergy.description: Improves the accuracy and evasion of allies in a 2-space radius by 10

synergy2.name: Synergy II
synergy2.description: Improves the accuracy and evasion of allies in a 3-space radius by 30

battlehymn.name: Battle Hymn
battlehymn.description: Improves the attack power of allies in a 3-space radius by 1

inheritedwill.name: Inherited Will
inheritedwill.description: Grants +3 attack power, +15 accuracy, +3 critical hit rate to allies within a 3-space radius

frontierimperator.name: Frontier Imperator
frontierimperator.description: Improves the attack power, defense and resistance of all allies by 1

darkpall.name: Dark Pall
darkpall.description: Improves the defense and resistance of all allies by 3

vestalveil.name: Vestal Veil
vestalveil.description: Improves the defense and resistance of all allies by 7

glamor.name: Glamor
glamor.description: Improves the attack power of adjacent allies by 3

senahsglamor.name: Senah's Glamor
senahsglamor.description: Improves the attack power of adjacent allies by 3

nutritionist.name: Nutritionist
nutritionist.description: Improves the attack power of adjacent allies by 3

goodneighbor.name: Good Neighbor
goodneighbor.description: Improves the defense and resistance of adjacent allies by 3

goodneighbor2.name: Good Neighbor II
goodneighbor2.description: Improves the defense and resistance of adjacent allies by 5

bestfriends.name: Best Friends
bestfriends.description: Grants a bond bonus of +3 defense and resistance on top of standard bond bonuses

multichance.name: Multichance
multichance.description: Allows the unit to sometimes deal two consecutive strikes

triplethreat.name: Triple Threat
triplethreat.description: Allows the unit to sometimes deal three conscecutive strikes

flurry.name: Flurry
flurry.description: Allows the unit to sometimes deal five consecutive strikes

deificrevels.name: Deific Revels
deificrevels.description: Allows the unit to sometimes deal five consecutive strikes

multistrike.name: Multistrike
multistrike.description: Allows the unit to always deal two consecutive strikes

deathseeker.name: Deathseeker
deathseeker.description: Allows the unit to continue battle until either side falls, or up to 32 rounds of combat (only when in range if countering)

persistent.name: Persistent
persistent.description: Allows the unit to continue battle, up to 32 rounds of combat (only when in range if countering)

criticaledge.name: Critical Edge
criticaledge.description: Improves critical hit rate by the unit's dexterity value

mettle.name: Mettle
mettle.description: Improves critical hit rate by [(Max HP - Current HP)/Max HP]×50 when the unit's HP is 50% or less

wrath.name: Wrath
wrath.description: Has a 25% chance of producing a critical hit when counterattacking

criticalreprisal.name: Critical Reprisal
criticalreprisal.description: Guarantees the unit's counterattacks are critical hits

benison.name: Benison
benison.description: Allows the unit to evade death upon taking a mortal blow

senahstenacity.name: Senah's Tenacity
senahstenacity.description: Allows the unit to evade death upon taking a mortal blow

poweroflove.name: Power of Love
poweroflove.description: Keeps a unit at 1 HP where they would otherwise die, except for Poison / event deaths / Foresight etc.

deathless.name: Deathless
deathless.description: Keeps a unit at 1 HP where they would otherwise die, except for Poison / event deaths / Foresight etc.

deathless2.name: Deathless (Special)
deathless2.description: Keeps a unit at 1 HP where they would otherwise die

guestunit.name: Guest Unit
guestunit.description: Incurs a game over unit if the unit dies

orison.name: Orison
orison.description: Improves evasion by [(Max HP - Current HP)/Max HP]×50 when the unit's HP is 50% or less

mothersorison.name: Mother's Orison
mothersorison.description: Improves evasion by [(Max HP - Current HP)/Max HP]×50 when the unit's HP is 50% or less

acumen.name: Acumen
acumen.description: Guarantees that attacks connect upon activation

lurk.name: Lurk
lurk.description: Improves terrain evasion bonuses by a factor of 1.5

dispeleffects.name: Dispel Effects
dispeleffects.description: Nullifies effective attacks and protects the unit from extra harm

ambush.name: Ambush
ambush.description: Allows the unit to sometimes strike first, even on enemy turns

firstblood.name: First Blood
firstblood.description: Allows the unit to always strike first, even on enemy turns

regenesis.name: Regenesis
regenesis.description: Allows the unit to recover 5 HP every turn

grandregenesis.name: Grand Regenesis
grandregenesis.description: Allows the unit to recover 30 HP every turn

hyperregenesis.name: Hyper Regenesis
hyperregenesis.description: Allows the unit to recover all HP every turn

bloodysustenance.name: Bloody Sustenance
bloodysustenance.description: Recovers HP based on damage dealt

lifesieve.name: Lifesieve
lifesieve.description: Restores HP equal to damage inflicted on opponents

paralysisstrike.name: Paralysis Strike
paralysisstrike.description: Inflicts the Paralysis status on the opponent when attacks connect

slumberstrike.name: Slumber Strike
slumberstrike.description: Inflicts the Slumber status on the opponent when attacks connect

berserkstrike.name: Berserk Strike
berserkstrike.description: Inflicts the Berserk status on the opponent when attacks connect

mandrake.name: Mandrake
mandrake.description: Inflicts the Berserk status on the opponent when attacks connect

crownsplitter.name: Crownsplitter
crownsplitter.description: May inflict the Paralysis status on the opponent when attacks connect

industry.name: Industry
industry.description: Has a 15% chance of granting the unit a second action (cannot active more than once per turn)

secondwind.name: Second Wind
secondwind.description: Has a 25% chance of granting the unit a second action (cannot active more than once per turn)

parrybows.name: Parry Bows
parrybows.description: Caps the accuracy of the opponent's bow attacks at 33

lockpick.name: Lockpick
lockpick.description: Allows the unit to open doors, chests, drawbridges and more without a key

herbforager.name: Herb Forager
herbforager.description: Potentially collect wild herbs every turn for 23 turns

variegate.name: Variegate
variegate.description: Blend in with the surroundings to become invisible (Assassins only)

haggler.name: Haggler
haggler.description: Allows the unit to make purchases at a 25% discount

masterhaggler.name: Master Haggler
masterhaggler.description: Allows the unit to make purchases at a 33% discount

moonlighter.name: Moonlighter
moonlighter.description: Improves total funds by 600D upon each level up

taskmaster.name: Taskmaster
taskmaster.description: Motivates an adjacent ally to take action again

tashasmoraleboost.name: Tasha's Morale Boost
tashasmoraleboost.description: Motivates all adjacent allies to take action again

doublemarch.name: Double March
doublemarch.description: Allows the unit to move with remaining mobility after combat

stalwart.name: Stalwart
stalwart.description: Prevents ailments, allows the unit to flee upon reaching 0 HP

lannasblessing.name: Lanna's Blessing
lannasblessing.description: Prevents ailments, allows the unit to flee upon reaching 0 HP

advancedclass.name: Advanced Class
advancedclass.description: Reduces EXP intake from combat to 60% (nullified by the Potential skill)
